title: Cafe Lush
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Breakfast and lunch cafe. Could get a tofu scramble, the Mo sandwich (omit rice cheese), the beet and sweet potato salad (omit feta), or the quinoa salad (omit feta). Ask to substitute tofu/tofu scramble into almost any of the breakfast dishes. Red and green chiles are vegan suitable.
